title: Brits out! (Irish Republican poster, 1980)
Text:: Brits out! 8th Annual Commemoration – Bloody Sunday – Derry – Sunday 27th January – Assemble  2.30p.m. Creggan Shops – MARCH AND RALLY – Prominent Republican Speakers.Year  1980.Publisher  An Phoblacht newspaper.Artist  NA.Additional information  Design shows three British soldiers against a red background, one of them aiming at the viewer. It was published in an issue of An Phoblacht newspaper and advertises a march to commemorate the eighth anniversary of Bloody Sunday, when British soldiers opened fire on a civil rights march, killing fourteen.
